citation_title: Is Protection Really for Sale? A Survey and Directions for Future Research
topics:
Microeconomics

Welfare and Collective Choice

International Economics

Trade
abstract: This paper critically and selectively surveys the literature on protection for sale and discusses directions for future research in this area. It suggests that the standard approach needs to be augmented to provide more compelling tests of this model.
acknowledgement: The views expressed herein are those of the author(s) and do not necessarily reflect the views of the National Bureau of Economic Research.
